attributes.action: Racism and violence in the World Cup
attributes.additional_details: With regards to the recent football U21 match between Serbia and England, I call upon the Government to fully support the Football Association and all United Kingdom football clubs to be united in its condemnation of not only the racist and violent actions against members of the England team and support staff, but also the subsequent denial from the Serbian FA that no racist taunting took place before or during the game, and their allegation of "inappropriate, unsportsmanlike and vulgar" behaviour by Danny Rose.
